alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 20 at 11:20PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MONROE AND NORTHERN RANDOLPH COUNTIES... At 1119 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Bud, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sparta, Red Bud, Coulterville, Tilden, Evansville, Baldwin, Eden, Preston, Prairie, Ruma, Houston, Walsh, Ames and Modoc. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
